name: Lantern of Distant Doors
effect: Wondrous: turns aside magic missiles and minor spells.
drawback: whispers a single ominous phrase at dawn

name: Orb of Waking Stars
effect: Wondrous: opens sealed doors and mundane locks with a touch.

name: Helm of Saints
effect: Worn: stores a spell-like effect that can be released later.

name: +3 Sword of Glass
effect: Weapon: turns aside magic missiles and minor spells.
drawback: leaves faint frost on whatever it touches

name: Shield of the Deep
effect: Worn: banishes a summoned creature on a failed save.
drawback: occasionally emits a bell-like chime at the worst time

name: Helm of Mirror
effect: Worn: allows flight for short bursts.
drawback: causes vivid dreams of places you've never been
